com.std.controller

Class CalendarController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.std.controller.CalendarController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class CalendarController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    This class is the observer of the model, it acts as the communication bridge between the view and the model. Whenever the model changes this observe can change what is needed in the view, also when there is an ActionEvent this class passes the information to the model

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      CalendarModel theModel
      The Calendar model is the mechanism to do all the logical operations of the calendar (add/remove/modify appointments)
      CalendarView theView
      The calendar view is the highest level of representation for the UI

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CalendarController(CalendarModel model, CalendarView view)
      The constructor of the Controller takes a model and a view and adds various listeners to the view and then adds itself as an observer of the model

      boolean saveAs() 
      void update(java.util.Observable o, java.lang.Object param)
      Called when there is a change in the model, this method will invoke the update method on the view and pass it the new set of ref appointments as well as the selected date and selected appointment

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
          java.lang.Object param)
        Called when there is a change in the model, this method will invoke the update method on the view and pass it the new set of ref appointments as well as the selected date and selected appointment
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        o - is the observable object that has changed
        param - is the parameter sent by the notifyObservers methods
